dialog:generate.description: [PREVIEW] Generate localized .lu, .lg, .qna and .dialog assets to define a bot based on a schema using templates.

debug.name: debug
debug.description: Show extra debugging information including templates.

merge.name: merge
merge.description: Merge generated results into output directory.

output.name: output
output.description: Output path for where to put generated .lu, .lg, .qna and .dialog files.

prefix.name: prefix
prefix.description: Prefix to use for generated files. [default: schema name]

templates.name: templates
templates.description: Directory with templates to use for generating assets.  With multiple directories, the first definition found wins.  To include the standard templates, just use "template:standard" as a template directory name.

verbose.name: verbose
verbose.description: Output verbose logging of files as they are processed

args.name: schema
args.description: JSON Schema file used to drive generation.

dialog:generate:swagger.description: [PREVIEW] Generate JSON schema given swagger file.

output.name: output
output.description: Output path for generated swagger schema files. [default: .]

verbose.name: verbose
verbose.description: Output verbose logging of files as they are processed.

args.name: path
args.description: The path to the swagger file

dialog:generate:test.description: [PREVIEW] Generate a .dialog test file from a .transcript file.

args.name: transcript
args.description: Transcript file to use for generating .dialog file
